article_title: 'They need to reach out to us': Canadians on Norwegian Jewel trying to get on government's radar
article_description: A Canadian tourist who says there are hundreds of Canadian passengers aboard a cruise ship that is being turned away from one port after another during the COVID 19 crisis  has a message for the federal government   They need to reach out to us
article_content: A Canadian tourist who says there are hundreds of Canadian passengers aboard a cruise ship that keeps being turned away from one port after another during the COVID 19 crisis has a message for the federal government   They need to reach out to us The cruis   4550 chars
